name: Facial Spray with Aloe Adaptogens, and Coconut Water
about: What it is:A mist for dehydrated skin with the refreshing blend of hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, and coconut water to nurture and refresh skin..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness and Dullness.Formulation:Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients:- Coconut Water: Vitamin-rich, hydrating, and refreshing..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, cruelty-free, gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This spray creates a radiant, dewy skin glow. A combination of adaptogens help nurture the skin, fight visible signs of aging, and improve skinu2019s overall appearance. Hyaluronic acid and niacinamide provide added hydration and help skin to maintain moisture levels with their humectant and occlusive properties.
ingredients: -Niacinamide: Restorative, visibly reduces pores..-Sodium Hyaluronate: Supremely hydrating and reduces the look of wrinkles..-Aloe Vera: Soothing and hydrating...Aqua (Water, Eau), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Niacinamide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Water, Acanthopanax Senticosus (Eleuthero) Root Extract, Inonotus Obliquus (Mushroom) Extract, Rhaponticum Carthamoides Root Extract, Rhodiola Rosea Extract, Selaginella Lepidophylla Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Sulfite, Trehalose, Potassium Sorbate, PPG-5-Ceteth-20, 1,2-Hexanediol, Maltodextrin, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorophenesin, Citric Acid.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Mist throughout the day to refresh and hydrate skin..-Mist before and after applying moisturizer for added hydration..-Spritz on after makeup application for a dewy, glowy finish..-Spritz makeup brush or sponge with mist, then apply and blend foundation and concealer. .-Add a final spritz of face mist for radiant, dewy skin. .-Store bottle in fridge for an extra refreshing and cooling mist.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for a fragrance-free facial mist that doesnu2019t irritate my sensitive skin for a while now and I finally came across this one. Itu2019s a great product! I l bought it specifically to use with a hyaluronic acid serum that I have. Hyaluronic acid needs moisture to work effectively, so I spritz this mist both under and over the serum. My skin feels soft and moisturized despite the dry winter weather Iu2019m experiencing.  My only caveat is that the packaging is not that great. Instead of a fine mist, like other facial mist brands I have tried, this one is more of a wet spray. Itu2019s hard to apply evenly apply and easy to get too much in one spot. I read in the description somewhere that it says it could be used as a makeup setting spray - unlikely due to how big the droplets are. I suppose itu2019s possible I got a faulty bottle, as it also did leak in shipping. (Sephora addressed this already so itu2019s all good.) I think Iu2019m going to try using the spray pump from a different empty bottle I have because thatu2019s the only issue keeping this from being a 5 start rating for me.
